general.template_info_description: Download the complete import template with sample data and detailed instructions for all data types.

general.restore_warning_message: This operation will overwrite all existing data with data from the backup file. Make sure you have a current backup before proceeding.
general.instruction_1: Download the template file by clicking the button above
general.instruction_2: Fill in your data in the Excel template following the column headers exactly
general.instruction_3: Do not modify or delete the header row (first row) in the template
general.instruction_4: Ensure all required fields are filled and data formats are correct
general.instruction_5: Save the file in .xlsx or .xls format before uploading
general.instruction_6: Upload the completed file using the file selector below
